pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCoursesDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.CoursesDetails =  $rootScope.CoursesResult[$routeParams.index];var template = pagedef.datatemplate;var data1 = $compile($(template))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCourses(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.resultfound = true;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.fetched = false;$scope.filterresult = function() {var searchTxt = $("#Coursestxt").val();$rootScope.Coursesval = searchTxt;var results = [];var patt = new RegExp(searchTxt, "i");var filterParams = pagedef.searchfields.split(",");$.each($scope.CoursesList.Course, function(index, val){var found=false;for(var i=0;i<filterParams.length;i++) {if(val[ "" + filterParams[i] + ""].match(patt)) {found=true;break;}}if(found) {results.push(val);}});$rootScope.CoursesResult = results;if(results.length > 0) {$scope.resultfound = true;}else {$scope.resultfound = false;}   };$scope.search = function() {if($scope.fetched == false) {$.blockUI();var url = pagedef.url;if(window.device) {}else {url = "/websimulator/xml?url=" + pagedef.url;}var xhr=$.ajax({url: url,dataType:"xml",async:true,data:{},success: function(resp){try {var results = $.xml2json(resp);$scope.fetched = true;$scope.CoursesList = results;$scope.filterresult();$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}catch(E) {alert ("Exception : " + E);}},error: function(e) {alert ("Error : " + e);$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});}});}else {$scope.filterresult();}}}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCanvas2(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { if(window.device){$.blockUI();} var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=yes,hidden=yes;enableViewportScale=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {iabRef.show();$.unblockUI();};var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();  };iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCoyoteQ(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {if (window.device) {$.blockUI();}var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=yes,hidden=yes,enableViewportScale=yes,clearcache=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {$.unblockUI();iabRef.show();        };var iabClose = function(data) {$.unblockUI();iabRef.removeEventListener("exit", iabClose);window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();iabRef.removeEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);};iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}
